title: Vietcong v1.60: Fist Alpha | No-CD Crack, Simply Download & Play
description:
You forge ahead through the thick, oppressive heat. Your erratic heartbeat and amplified breaths are all that escape the hostile stillness. Sweat beads down your face as an all too familiar vibration breaks your concentration. You turn to face the threat while the rookie lays down a wild burst of gunfire into the trees up ahead...

Experience the danger, fear, and unpredictability of lethal jungle warfare against a cunning enemy in Vietcong, a first-person action shooter set during the infamous conflict in Southeast Asia. Command expertly trained members of the U.S. Special Forces on critical missions through dangerous territories. You are the leader of one of the finest fighting forces ever assembled. It's time to show the world what you're made of. 

Summary

Set in the height of the Vietnam War (1965-1975), Vietcong is arguably the best Vietnam War game and offers a unique insight to jungle warfare.

Singleplayer Campaign

You are a member of the U.S. Special Forces Sergeant First Class Steve R. Hawkins; born 13th October 1939, in Wilmington North Carolina, who has been assigned to the United States Special Forces camp at Nui Pek. Nui Pek is situated near where the Ho Chi Minh trail reenters Vietnam from Cambodia, so it is considered one of the most dangerous areas in all of Vietnam. Hawkins leads one of the special forces teams stationed at Nui Pek, each member of whom is a Sergeant in their own right, and has their own specialties.

Multiplayer

In addition to the Singleplayer Campaign, the game features several stand-alone single player maps and network and online multiplay. Multiplay game modes include capture the flag (CTF), Capture the flag with Bots, deathmatch (DM), team deathmatch (TDM), assault team game (ATG), cooperative game US(COOP), cooperative game VC (COOP_VC), Turn Table (TT), King of the Hill (KOTH), last man standing (LMS), and real war (RW). Nearly five years after the game's release, Vietcong as a multiplayer is still popular. There are still thousands of players around the globe playing in numerous servers.

Vietcong multiplayer requires jungle warfare strategies and tactics to outsmart the enemy. Camoflauge and stealth in the dense jungle maps available on multiplayer are a large part of the game. Other skills that are utilized by players are: hunting and tracking; sniping and counter-sniping; positioning and movement.

Details

Developer(s): Pterodon
Illusion Softworks 
Publisher(s): Gathering of Developers 
Engine: Ptero-Engine II 
Platform(s): PC (Windows) 
Release date(s): NA March 26, 2003
PAL April 17, 2003
 
Genre(s): Tactical first-person shooter 
Mode(s): Singleplayer, Multiplayer 
Rating(s): BBFC: 18
ESRB: Teen
 
Media: CD-ROM

   Minimum                                                                   
   700mhz Pentium 3 or 4 or AMD Athalon processor                            
   16X CD Rom                                                                
   1.8 GB free HD space                                                      
   256 MB Ram                                                                
   32 MB Video Card DirectX 8.1 compatible                                   
                                                                             
                                                                             
   Recommended                                                               
   1GHZ Pentium 4 and AMD Athalon Processor                                  
   32X CD Rom                                                                
   1.8 GB free HD space                                                      
   256+ MB Ram                                                               
   64 MB video card with DirectX 8.1 compatible
